price: 62. Is dat een beter vermaak of de Zaqqoemboom (die groeit in de Hel)?
arabic: أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٞ نُّزُلًا أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ ٱلزَّقُّومِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: adhālika khayrun nuzulan am shajaratu al-zaqūmi
